sentences.sContent: We treated Mom to lunch at the Savoy.
sentences.sCn: 我们请妈妈在萨沃伊酒店吃午饭。

sentences.sContent: Lettie had never yet failed to return from town without some special treat for him.
sentences.sCn: 莱蒂每次从城里回来都要带一些特别的礼物送给他。

phrases.pCn: 不招待就使坏（指万圣节孩子们挨家逐户要糖果等礼物，如不遂愿便恶作剧一番的风俗）
各付己帐；各自付帐的聚餐或娱乐活动

trans.tranOther: something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it
to buy or do something special for someone that you know they will enjoy
